sentences.en: A high CRT rate doesn't equate a good quality of exposure.
sentences.cn: 但是高点选率不等于优良点选质,许多受到愚弄的网虫会快速离开该广告所连结的网站,甚至生成反感.

sentences.en: And to social science historians who equate their activity with specific techniques.
sentences.cn: 后者以为历史的研究是具体方法的研究.

sentences.en: Any violation of deadlines contained in the contract wil equate to breach of contract.
sentences.cn: 凡违反合同规定的任何期限都等同违约.

sentences.en: Did Walter equate the balance of nature with God?
sentences.cn: 沃尔特把自然的平衡和上帝划等号 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hence, on no account can we equate happiness with wealth.
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们决不能把快乐等同于财富.

sentences.en: I'm always wary of men wearing suits, as I equate this with power and authority.
sentences.cn: 我向来提防穿西服的男人，因为我认为穿西服就等同于权力和权威。

sentences.en: If there was morality in law they should equate.
sentences.cn: 如果法律包括道义的话,两者应当是等同的.

sentences.en: People equate success in life with the ability of operating computer.
sentences.cn: t人们把会使用计算机与人生成功相提并论.

sentences.en: Second, many people equate laid - off workers with unemployed people, which is incorrect.
sentences.cn: 其二, 许多人把 下岗 职工等同于失业人员, 这是不恰当的.

sentences.en: The brands will make the public equate them with other interrelated products.
sentences.cn: 商标会很容易使公众把它与相关产品等同起来.

sentences.en: They have taken measures to equate the salaries of higher civil servants to those of business executives.
sentences.cn: 他们采取措施使高级文职人员的工资和企业管理干部的工资相等.

sentences.en: You can't equate his poems with his plays.
sentences.cn: 你不能把他的诗跟剧本相提并论.

sentences.en: You cannot equate his poems with his plays.
sentences.cn: 你不可以把他的诗歌和他的剧本相提并论.

sentences.en: You cannot equate success in financial matters with greed.
sentences.cn: 你不能把金融领域的成功与贪婪划等号.

sentences.en: You equate home with safety, comfort , shelter, and protection.
sentences.cn: 你把家看作是安全的 、 适的 、 风挡雨的和保护你的.

words.tran_cn: 方程式，等式；相等；[化学] 反应式

phrases.tran_cn: 把…等同；使相等；同等相待
